    All Classes and Interfaces

    Class
    Description
    AbstractDAO<T>
    Abstract Data Access Object providing generic CRUD operations for entities of type T.
    Bill
    Represents a bill associated with an order.
    BillDAO
    Data Access Object for managing bills in the database.
    Client
    Represents a client in the system.
    ClientBLL
    Business Logic Layer class for handling Client-related operations.
    ClientController
    ClientController manages interaction between ClientView and ClientBLL.
    ClientDAO
    Data Access Object for managing clients in the database.
    ClientView
    ClientView class represents the client management UI.
    ConnectionFactory
    Factory class to manage database connections.
    EmailValidator
    Validator to check if a client's email address matches a valid email pattern.
    MainController
    Controller class for MainView.
    MainView
    MainView class represents the main menu window.
    Order
    Represents an order placed by a client for a product.
    OrderBLL
    Business Logic Layer class for handling Order-related operations.
    OrderController
    The OrderController class manages the logic for order creation and display.
    OrderDAO
    Data Access Object for managing orders in the database.
    OrderValidator
    Validator for the Order entity, checking quantity and shipping address.
    OrderView
    The OrderView class represents the GUI for creating and viewing orders.
    PhoneValidator
    Validator to check the validity of a client's phone number.
    PriceValidator
    Validator to ensure that the price of a product is positive.
    Product
    Represents a product in the system.
    ProductBLL
    Business Logic Layer class for handling Product-related operations.
    ProductController
    The ProductController class handles user actions from the ProductView, coordinating between the view and the business logic related to products and orders.
    ProductDAO
    Data Access Object for managing products in the database.
    ProductView
    The ProductView class represents the GUI for managing products.
    StockValidator
    Validator to ensure that the stock quantity of a product is positive.
    Validator<T>
    Generic interface for validators that check the validity of objects of type T.
